brand.name: Ibrah
brand.tagline: Stories that leave a lesson behind
brand.description: In every story lies a truth. In every truth, a lesson worth learning. Ibrah brings reflections from the Qur’an, Sunnah, and real life to awaken the heart and guide the soul.

quranAyat.title: On Patience and Trust
quranAyat.translation: And give good tidings to the patient.
quranAyat.shortText: Allah promises glad tidings for those who remain patient during trials.

quranAyat.title: On Gratitude
quranAyat.translation: If you are grateful, I will surely increase you.
quranAyat.shortText: Gratitude opens the door to more blessings from Allah.

quranAyat.title: On Divine Help
quranAyat.arabic: وَمَن يَتَّقِ اللَّهَ يَجْعَل لَّهُ مَخْرَجًا
quranAyat.translation: And whoever fears Allah, He will make for him a way out.
quranAyat.shortText: Taqwa creates exits where none seem to exist.

quranAyat.title: On Allah’s Nearness
quranAyat.shortText: Allah reassures that He is always near to those who call upon Him.

quranAyat.title: On Hope and Mercy
quranAyat.translation: Do not despair of the mercy of Allah.
quranAyat.shortText: No sin is greater than Allah’s mercy for the one who repents.

quranAyat.title: On the Purpose of Life
quranAyat.arabic: وَمَا خَلَقْتُ الْجِنَّ وَالْإِنسَ إِلَّا لِيَعْبُدُونِ
quranAyat.translation: I did not create jinn and humans except to worship Me.
quranAyat.shortText: Our existence finds meaning in worship and obedience to Allah.

hadith.title: The Best of People
hadith.text: The best of people are those who are most beneficial to others.
hadith.shortText: True excellence lies in serving humanity with sincerity.

hadith.title: On Mercy
hadith.text: Whoever does not show mercy to people will not be shown mercy by Allah.
hadith.shortText: Mercy toward creation brings mercy from the Creator.

hadith.title: Purpose of the Prophet’s Mission
hadith.text: I was sent only to perfect good character.
hadith.shortText: Islam places character at the heart of faith.

hadith.title: Allah Looks at the Heart
hadith.text: Allah does not look at your appearance or wealth, but He looks at your hearts and deeds.
hadith.shortText: True worth is measured by sincerity and action, not outward appearance.

hadith.title: Ease After Hardship
hadith.text: Know that victory comes with patience, relief with hardship, and ease with difficulty.
hadith.shortText: Every hardship carries within it the promise of relief.

hadith.title: Value of Intentions
hadith.text: Actions are judged by intentions, and each person will get what they intended.
hadith.shortText: A sincere intention can turn ordinary deeds into acts of worship.

stories.title: The Generous Neighbor
stories.shortText: Despite poverty, a man shared his small meal daily with his neighbor and witnessed unseen blessings.
stories.lesson: Generosity, even in hardship, multiplies goodness.

stories.title: The Honest Merchant
stories.shortText: A trader who never hid defects in his goods earned trust beyond profit.
stories.lesson: Honesty builds success that wealth alone cannot.

stories.title: The Forgiving Heart
stories.shortText: A grieving mother chose forgiveness over revenge and found peace no anger could give.
stories.lesson: Forgiveness frees the heart before it frees the other.

stories.title: The Silent Charity
stories.shortText: A man gave charity quietly every month, unknown to anyone, until his loss revealed how many lives he had supported.
stories.lesson: Sincere charity shines brightest when done in secret.

stories.title: The Power of Dua
stories.shortText: A father raised his hands every night for his struggling child, and years later saw doors open unexpectedly.
stories.lesson: No sincere dua is ever wasted, even if delayed.

stories.title: The Broken Promise
stories.shortText: A young man repeatedly broke promises and lost trust, until he learned that words are a form of responsibility.
stories.lesson: Keeping promises is a sign of true faith.

stories.title: The Mother’s Patience
stories.shortText: A mother endured years of hardship without complaint, trusting Allah when no one else understood her pain.
stories.lesson: Patience held for Allah is never unseen.

stories.title: The Moment of Repentance
stories.shortText: A man turned back to Allah after one sincere tear in sujood changed the direction of his life.
stories.lesson: One moment of true repentance can rewrite a lifetime.
